TopicTitle: So, I don't think i've ever seen anything like this before

Articles.Content:
I... i just don't know what to say...

/\ This is why you use F1 to take in-game screenshots. In any case, yeah.. that kerbal looks like he uh.. er.. I don't know, THAT'S MESSED UP

it was because I took this pic when i was playing on a school computer, if I pressed F1, (unlike my home computer) i won't know where the screenshot would go, or if it was 'allowed' in the school computers, so I pressed 'print screen' and pasted/sent to myself via email.

(and if you're wondering, me and a couple of friends used hard-drives to install KSP on the school computers

it was for some school project...

it was because I took this pic when i was playing on a school computer, if I pressed F1, (unlike my home computer) i won't know where the screenshot would go, or if it was 'allowed' in the school computers, so I pressed 'print screen' and pasted/sent to myself via email.

(and if you're wondering, me and a couple of friends used hard-drives to install KSP on the school computers

He's running Windows OSX 7! :S

Seriously though, tychochallenge, you should have really pushed imgur a bit harder. That really is atrocious to look at.

(this is like my own version of xkcd 1373 - the windowed-windowed-windowed content is shortin' out my brain.. ARGH just take a proper screenshot! F1 in game! Or at least alt-printscreen in windows! or do some local editing - load the original screenshot in gimp, crop out the unwanted parts, and export it as .jpg - imgur has never rejected any of gimp's jpgs for me.
